name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
B station up master "Guangzhou Takeaway Guide" released a video, saying that Guangzhou takeaway drivers are fully recruited, and Meituan no longer issues numbers to stations. Many people recruited before are now unable to join the company.
At the same time, according to the data in February, takeaway orders are shrinking. In February, only 3 people earned more than 10,000 yuan. By the 50th place, there were only more than 500 orders, earning about 4,000 yuan.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
On March 17, Southwest University released the "Civil Servant" micro-major enrollment brochure.
The enrollment targets are full-time undergraduate students in the second year and above of Southwest University. The school system is 1 year, the credits are 24 credits, and the tuition fee is 1,920 yuan. The course plan includes an introduction to the application essay, the basics of administrative ability test, and official document writing.

name: 李老师不是你老师
